answers.answer: Hello and welcome to the forum. The symptoms being experienced by you could be due to several causes like urinary tract infection, diabetes mellitus, prostatitis, kidney stones, chlamydial infection, gonorrhea.Sometimes bad hygiene itself can lead to urinary tract infection and itching in the genitals and groin when bacterial overgrowth overwhelms the body’s immune system. I will advise you to seek the opinion of an experienced urologist .A complete history, clinical examination and investigations like urine analysis and blood sugar testing may be needed. Do keep us posted. Good luck.

question: Hi,I am jst wondering if the following symptoms are due to UTI1. Frequent night urinals2. Urgency to urinate after drinking liquids and frequent urination evry 20-30 min.3. Discharge when going to stool4. Smelly near scortum5.Itching near groin nd b/w legs
title: UTI infection
